Verses: 1 karththaraik Gembeeramaaip Paadi, Nammudaiya Ratchaniyak Kanmalaiyai Sangeerththanam Pannakkadavom Vaarungal.
2 thudhiththaludane Avar Sannidhikku Munbaaga Vandhu, Sangeedhangalaal Avarai Aarppariththup Paadakkadavom.
3 karththare Magaa Dhevanum, Ellaa Dhevargalukkum Magaaraajanumaayirukkiraar.
4 boomiyin Aazhangal Avar Kaiyil Irukkiradhu; Parvadhangalin Uyarangalum Avarudaiyavaigal.
5 samuththiram Avarudaiyadhu, Avare Adhai Undaakkinaar; Vettaandharaiyaiyum Avarudaiya Karam Uruvaakkitru.
6 nammai Undaakkina Karththarukku Munbaaga Naam Panindhu Kunindhu Muzhangaarpadiyidakkadavom Vaarungal.
7 avar Nammudaiya Dhevan; Naam Avar Meychchalin Janangalum, Avar Kaikkullaana Aadugalumaame.
8 indru Avarudaiya Saththaththaik Ketpeergalaagil, Vanaandharaththil Kobam Moottinabodhum Sodhanai Naalilum Nadandhadhupola, Ungal Irudhayaththaik Kadinappaduththaadheyungal.
9 ange Ungal Pidhaakkal Ennai Sodhiththu, Ennaip Pareetchai Paarththu, En Kiriyaiyaiyum Kandaargal.
10 naarpadhu Varushamaai Naan Andha Sandhadhiyai Arosiththu, Avargal Vazhuvippogira Irudhayamulla Janamendrum, Ennudaiya Vazhigalai Ariyaadhavargalendrum Solli,
11 ennudaiya Ilaippaarudhalil Avargal Piravesippadhillaiyendru, Ennudaiya Kobaththile Aanaiyitten.
